title: Glen Canyon National Recreation Area: 2008 News Release Archive
body: 2008 News Release Archive       December 2008  12/22/2008 Update on Fire at Halls Crossing (pdf) 12/19/2008 Fire at Halls Crossing Marina (pdf) 12/19/2008 Holiday Closure for Carl Hayden Visitor Center (pdf) 12/04/2008 Draft Uplake Development Plan Released (pdf) 12/02/2008 Dangling Rope Marina Closed for Winter (pdf)  November 2008  11/18/2008 Deepen Castle Rock Cut FONSI Released (pdf) 11/18/2008 Hidden Slough FONSI Released (pdf) 11/03/2008 Work to Begin on Hidden Slough Project (pdf)  October 2008  10/30/2008 Glen Canyon Update for Fall and Winter 2009 (pdf) 10/24/2008 Glen Canyon to Waive Fees for Veterans on Veterans Day (pdf) 10/24/2008 Mussel Offenders Summoned to Court (pdf) 10/10/2008 Boat Accident Victim Found (pdf)  September 2008  9/30/2008 Triathlon to be Held at Lake Powell (pdf) 9/30/2008 Event Held in Celebration of National Public Lands Day (pdf) 9/22/2008 Visitor Dies After Falling Off Boat (pdf) 9/17/2008 Fee Free Day - September 27th (pdf) 9/11/2008 Event Scheduled to Celebrate National Public Lands Day (pdf) 9/5/2008 EA for Hidden Slough Revegetation Available for Comment (pdf)  July 2008  7/3/2008 Search for Presumed Drowning Victim Continues (pdf)  June 2008  6/27/2008 Swimmer Disappears on the San Juan River; Presumed Drowned (pdf) 6/27/2008 Additional Funding for Invasive Mussel Prevention (pdf) 6/24/2008 One Dead, Seven Ill from CO Poisoning (pdf) 6/16/2008 Swimmer Fatality at Farley Canyon (pdf) 6/13/2008 Castle Rock Cut Open (pdf) 6/12/2008 Installation and Welcome Ceremony Set for New Glen Canyon Superintendent Stan Austin (pdf) 6/6/2008 Vessels with Live Mussels to be Quarantined (pdf) 6/4/2008 Public Scoping Begins for Revisions to Uplake Development Concept Plan (pdf)  May 2008  5/23/2008 Summer Season Begins (pdf) 5/16/2008 Updated Superintendent's Compendium Available (pdf) 5/15/2008 Expansion of Zebra Mussel Prevention Program (pdf)  April 2008  4/7/2008 Fire Destroys Concessioner Dormitory (pdf) 4/7/2008 Missing Plane Located (pdf) 4/3/2008 Heavy Snowpack in Rockies Will Likely Raise Lake Powell to Highest Levels Since 2002 (pdf)  March 2008  3/26/2008 Public Scoping Begins for Glen Canyon Rim Trail (pdf) 3/24/2008 Roadwork on Lakeshore Drive Begins April 2 (pdf) 3/11/2008 Chains Area to be Temporarily Closed March 17-24 for Cleanup Project (pdf)  February 2008  2/19/2008 Castle Rock Cut Environmental Assessment Released for Public Review (pdf) 2/12/2008 Discovery Glen Canyon Photo Contest Winner Announced (pdf)
